svg.title: ISO/IEC 9995-3:2009A, Common Secondary Layout of the Alphanumeric Zone of the Alphanumeric Section (with Primary Layout)
svg.desc: A graphical depiction of an ISO standard defining layouts of computer keyboards.

g.font-family: 'New Century Schoolbook', Palatino, Times, Courier, Helvetica, 'Cordia New', Ayuthaya, Tahoma, 'Arial Unicode MS', sans-serif
